alert.note: Alert for Benton; Cedar; Hickory; St. Clair; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 9:31AM CDT until May 15 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR HICKORY...NORTHERN CEDAR...BENTON...ST. CLAIR AND NORTHEASTERN VERNON COUNTIES... At 931 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Clinton to 6 miles southwest of Deepwater to near Walker, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pomme de Terre Lake... Truman Lake... Truman State Park... Pomme De Terre State Park... El Dorado Springs... Warsaw... Stockton... Pittsburg... Lincoln... Appleton City... Cole Camp... Osceola... Lowry City... Hermitage... Weaubleau... Wheatland... Walker... Schell City... Preston... Cross Timbers... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 99 and 107. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Cedar; Hickory; St. Clair; Vernon
